p: At present, clinical trials have been conducted in China to evaluate its effect on the treatment of COVID-19. On February 4, 2020, Li Lanjuan's team released the latest research results in Wuhan: Abidol and Darunavir can effectively inhibit SARS-COV-2, which is a significant finding in treating COVID-19. To date, most of the broad-spectrum antiviral drugs used in clinical practice, and the therapeutic effect mostly needs practical evaluation. Blind use of antibacterial drugs should be avoided, especially in combination with broad-spectrum antibacterial drugs. [ 39]
